name: 2048 Hoops
description:
Based on the infamous Tower of Hanoi brain teaser phenomenon, comes the next step, 2048 Hoops.

Toss out your handbook, because this edition of the puzzle comes with a brightly coloured twist: merging hoops! Sort, collect, and merge your numbered rings together, until you reach the 2048 hoop, and beyond!

Are you up to the challenge?

2048 Hoops features:
-Multiple levels to enjoy
-Changing stack sizes
-Merge circles together
-Colourful graphics
-Relaxing gameplay
